snippet.title: Polygoneer - Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab it here: http://bit.ly/BigheadRunner

Follow our developer's page: http://bit.ly/NukDeveloper

Follow me on Twitter: http://bit.ly/NukGamesTwitter
POLYGONEER is an arcade reflex based game. You should defend yourself from polygonal enemies that come from all sides, hitting them with the right color shot, one miss and its the end.
